title: Home Theatre: The Winner of Homemakers EXPO Gold Award
text: Home Theatre: The Winner of Homemakers EXPO Gold Award South Africa, 30 September 2015 -- We offer a complete solution which includes the services of: interior designers, acoustic experts, carpenters, networking experts, cinema seating and LED/fibre optic lighting specialistsAudio Visuals Gurus is the pioneer of the home theatre solution offering complete solutions of interior design, cinema seating and LED. The professional experts accommodate the home owner with the superior guidance regarding technology and audio visual related affairs. In the current year AV Gurus is awarded with Homemakers Expo Gold Award 2015. This is the only one South African Company which has been nominated for CEDIA Awards 2015. Their world class designs and aural treatment products helped them to achieve such respect and awards. As a Gold Award winner AV Gurus performed a supreme role in the grand look. They were the ambience of the show this year. The company is largely branched with home theatre, home automation, multi-room audio, home theatre system, home cinema design , audio and full audio solutions. AV gurus provide the home cinema installation service and they offer expertise required for a high end home cinema installation. Multi-room audio systems with advanced components will enhance your musical experience by making it easier and more enjoyable. In a tabulate the company assists in transforming the dream into reality with the design and installation of home theatres. They also provide 3D designs to give your room an elegant and lively look. The company has a big list on their successful projects. To know more about the available products and the projects the interested candidate can take a glance at http://hometheatre.co.za About Audio Visual Gurus: AV Gurus is not only a home theatre solution provider but also they associate in installing CCTV, DSTV and Home automation systems together with architects and electronic engineers. The company dreams your dream to turn into reality. From vintage theme to modern home theatre solutions you choose and they fulfill. Their dignity lies in every single installation. They have an oath to themselves to provide the superior service and highest quality products conveniently.
